title: $10 RP Card not redeeming
body: I need help and i've noticed you have helped others out with this problem. I went to walmart about 2 hours ago. Got me 2 $10 RP cards. Got home all happy and stuff ready to get this new skin when i get this error code. Just wanted to know if you could help me out ASAP.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: It's a bummer coming home to find that your prepaid cards aren't working.  :(  We'd like to help out!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team will get you squared away.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as possible!

What error code? If you submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) they can help you out within a few days; please be patient, and do not bump the ticket as it will push it to the back of the queue.
